languages.text: "Гипотеза — как только лифт, ведущий в обсерваториум, будет запущен, мы будем атакованы. Палубная стража скитариев активируется и атакует нас. Запрашиваю подтверждение готовности к боестолкновению".
"Hypothesis: as soon as the lift going up to the observatorium is operational, we will be attacked. The deck guard will activate and attack us. Requesting confirmation of readiness for combat."
languages.original_text: "Гипотеза — как только лифт, ведущий в обсерваториум, будет запущен, мы будем атакованы. Палубная стража скитариев активируется и атакует нас. Запрашиваю подтверждение готовности к боестолкновению".

languages.text: 「仮説：観察室に向かうリフトが動きしだい、我々は攻撃される。デッキの警備が軌道して我々を攻撃する。戦闘準備の確認を求む」
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: as soon as the lift going up to the observatorium is operational, we will be attacked. The deck guard will activate and attack us. Requesting confirmation of readiness for combat."

traits.locale_text: 「仮説：観察室に向かうリフトが動きしだい、我々は攻撃される。デッキの警備が軌道して我々を攻撃する。戦闘準備の確認を求む」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “假设：一旦通往瞭望台的电梯开始运作，我们就会遭到袭击。甲板守卫会启动，开始攻击我们。请确认已做好战斗准备。”
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: as soon as the lift going up to the observatorium is operational, we will be attacked. The deck guard will activate and attack us. Requesting confirmation of readiness for combat."

traits.locale_text: “假设：一旦通往瞭望台的电梯开始运作，我们就会遭到袭击。甲板守卫会启动，开始攻击我们。请确认已做好战斗准备。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Hypothèse : dès que l'ascenseur menant à l'observatorium sera opérationnel, les gardes du pont vont s'activer et nous attaquer. Demande de confirmation : êtes-vous {mf|prêt|prête} à combattre ? »
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: as soon as the lift going up to the observatorium is operational, we will be attacked. The deck guard will activate and attack us. Requesting confirmation of readiness for combat."

traits.locale_text: « Hypothèse : dès que l'ascenseur menant à l'observatorium sera opérationnel, les gardes du pont vont s'activer et nous attaquer. Demande de confirmation : êtes-vous {mf|prêt|prête} à combattre ? »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Hipótesis: en cuanto el ascensor que da acceso al observatorium esté operacional, comenzarán a atacarnos. La guardia de cubierta se activará y nos atacará. Solicitando confirmación de preparación para el combate».
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: as soon as the lift going up to the observatorium is operational, we will be attacked. The deck guard will activate and attack us. Requesting confirmation of readiness for combat."

traits.locale_text: «Hipótesis: en cuanto el ascensor que da acceso al observatorium esté operacional, comenzarán a atacarnos. La guardia de cubierta se activará y nos atacará. Solicitando confirmación de preparación para el combate».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hypothese: Sobald der Lift zum Observatorium funktionsfähig ist, werden wir attackiert. Die Deckwache wird aktiviert werden und uns angreifen. Erbitte Bestätigung der Kampfbereitschaft."
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: as soon as the lift going up to the observatorium is operational, we will be attacked. The deck guard will activate and attack us. Requesting confirmation of readiness for combat."

traits.locale_text: "Hypothese: Sobald der Lift zum Observatorium funktionsfähig ist, werden wir attackiert. Die Deckwache wird aktiviert werden und uns angreifen. Erbitte Bestätigung der Kampfbereitschaft."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hipotez: Gözlemhaneye çıkan asansör faal hâle gelir gelmez saldırıya uğrayacağız. Güverte muhafızı devreye girip bize saldıracak. Çatışmaya hazır olunduğunun onayı talep ediliyor."
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: as soon as the lift going up to the observatorium is operational, we will be attacked. The deck guard will activate and attack us. Requesting confirmation of readiness for combat."

traits.locale_text: "Hipotez: Gözlemhaneye çıkan asansör faal hâle gelir gelmez saldırıya uğrayacağız. Güverte muhafızı devreye girecek ve bize saldıracak. Çatışmaya hazır olunduğunun onayı talep ediliyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
